website_summaries.verdict: The Asus ROG G752VT-DH72 is a big, powerful gaming laptop that's priced well relative to its features and performance. It's not the fastest system in the category, but it's affordable and lets you plays demanding games smoothly.
pros: Plenty of storage and a speedy solid-state boot drive
cons: Small keyboard for such a large laptop
Anti-glare coating on display mutes images

customer_reviews.title: ... Asus ROG for over a year now and still love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Asus ROG for over a year now and still love it..great to play games on because of the large screen and good graphics, plus very fast and good to look at. I also use it for Office, Facebook, Twitter, photographs, streaming, music and sometimes downloading TV programmes. I love the huge keyboard (USA) and the lighting behind the keys....Intel Core 17 and Geforce GTX. Brilliant screen, and lots of features......My favourite laptop and I have four of them....only my specialty made by tech guys desk top is faster. I recommend it now I have used it for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Janet V. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: I've had it for 2 months now and there's nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 2 months now and there's nothing I can complain about. Will update this if this changes. [2 Year update:] Using it as I'm typing this review. Very pleased with it. I've managed to break a couple of buttons while playing FIFA and had to order some spares for a around 50-ish pounds, but that's the only problem I've had with it. Very very pleased with it. Been doing software development with SDK, VM, lots of browser tabs open and playing FIFA while smashing the buttons because my reptilian brain thinks it will make the footballers run faster. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TCA

customer_reviews.title: The Beast
customer_reviews.text: A real monster of a notebook: it's super fast, powerful and quiet. I bought it for office and graphic editing (Photoshop etc) applications. Only cons are size and weight - this thing is HUGE! But that's exactly what makes it an excellent replacement for a desktop, while remaining portable with minimal desk footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Dr K

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, Headphones should be considered for better sound.
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic powerful laptop. Only thing that I didn't like about it was the SOUND, but was able to improve it by changing some of the sound settings. Still not the best sound though, especially for the price. Sound is okay with headphones.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! It's very fast, despite Windows's usual bloatware but overall I'm very excited about this laptop! It can virtually play anything you can think of with these graphics and I just love it ! I love the 17'' display, compared to my previous laptop this is definitely a massive upgrade!! One con about the manufacturing is that it's extremely heavy. Other than that it's perfect! Also it arrived by 22 July as stated, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Super Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, this laptop can do just about any heavy work, audio, film editing, anything really, it boots faster than a smart tv which is about 7 seconds, the SSDs are truly an advantage, Windows 10 Home hasn't given me any problems so far. HIDevolution also have some outstanding customer services and technical support.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Munch

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery awesome laptop and great company.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and the box had been opened previously to swap the usa power cord for UK one( which I already knew to expect). Absolutely no problems at all and the laptop is a monster starts up in seconds and runs everything I have tried on max performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adapter and power cord did not match, but laptop is very good.
customer_reviews.text: Computer and software is very nice. Only minus is that seller added adapter for EU socket, but cord from adapter to power socket was UK type and didn't even mach connection to adapter itself. Had to get new cord.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything's fine: congrats
customer_reviews.text: Nice computer (of course !) Ultra-fast delivery and everything's fine. Keep doing samely. Congratulations !
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Works smoothly and fast! Thanks to HIDevolution UK for my ROG G752VT-RH71!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I paid a full price a laptop in UK from ...
customer_reviews.text: I paid a full price a laptop in UK from UK to get a foreign keyboard... So cheap. Anyway this laptop works very well, just some issues between windows 10 and Asus software.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop - Great service!
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest and say that the whole process of purchasing this laptop has been effortless, the original broken seal on the box was explained clearly by a letter placed inside with regards to the power cable. The machine itself is fantastic! Quiet and powerful. Overall I have to say I would recommend HIDevolution, 5 star service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This made the laptop totally useless (unless I decide to use an external keyboard on ...
customer_reviews.text: The laptop had a faulty keyboard. Some of the keys were lagging and key strokes were being skipped. This made the laptop totally useless (unless I decide to use an external keyboard on a brand new laptop). Couldn't even get a replacement, as there weren't any in stock. I'm really disappointed and I don't think I'd ever buy an ASUS laptop again or buy anything from this reseller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great computer, super small sdd though. bare able to have 3-4 programs installed. :(
customer_reviews.author: Max N.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why this computer always display a black screen after the login page after two days of purchase. Actually, they replace a new computer for me last time for this black screen problem, but it happens on the new computer as well. The reason is unknown! I really doubt Asus quality now and it is my first time using Asus computer. Disappointing is what I want to describe my feelings.
customer_reviews.author: C Q.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not come as specified GTX970M instead of GTX 980M
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware, poor choise of windows edition.
customer_reviews.text: What ever possessed the sellers to deliver this machine with WIN10 HOME and not pro is a question we'd all like to know the answer to. Selling a pc like this with HOME and not PRO is outright ridiculous! I now have to go through the bother of reinstalling Win10 + drivers ex ex. It' s frankly not OK Anyone buying a product like this is serious about it and expect things like group policy editor and powershell to work flawlessly. To deliver it with just Home edition (where said functions is disabled) is just plain not ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 😍❤🍃
customer_reviews.text: Mine is already 4 years old and it was the best purchase I made for Amazon, I am in love with my Asus.
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a Laptop
customer_reviews.text: A beast of a laptop it can run every thing I have on max I love it great combination with i7 unlocked cpu and gtx 980m with 8gb awesome display with G-SYNG and I love the design
customer_reviews.author: diyan todorov

product_meta.title: Asus ROG G752VT-RH71-HID1 G-SYNC 17.3" (i7-6700HQ 2.6-3.5GHz / GTX 970M 3GB / 1TB HDD / 16GB RAM / DVDRW)
product_meta.description:
INCLUDES
6th Generation "Skylake" Intel Core i7-6700HQ Quad Core Processor, 2.6 GHz (Max Turbo Frequency 3.5GHz), 6MB Smart Cache
nVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M 192bit w/ 3GB GDDR5 - DX11
Genuine Windows 10 Home 64 bit
17.3" Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS Antiglare LED backlit LCD Display w/ NVIDIA G-SYNC enabled
16GB DDR4 2133 MHz System Memory (2 x 8GB) - 4 Memory Slots
1TB 7200RPM 6Gb/s Hard Drive
Tray Load Dual Layer DVDRW (DVD+-RW, CD-RW)
1.2MP HD Web Camera
Intel 7265ac Wireless ac/a/g/n 2x2 NGFF With Bluetooth 4.0
Antighosting Red Backlit Gaming Keyboard - US English
Built-in Speakers And Array Microphone, Subwoofer
High Capacity 6-cell Lithium Ion Battery
A/C Adapter Output: 180W, Input: 100-240V - WILL WORK WORLDWIDE
Ports - 1 x Microphone-in jack, 1 x Line-in Jack, 1 x USB 3.1 TYPE C, 3 x USB 3.0, 1 x RJ45 LAN Jack for LAN insert, 1 x Thunderbolt 3 port, 1 x micro SDXC
1 Year Limited Warranty

World domination. Evolved.
Intel Skylake processor w/ NVIDIA GeForce GTX graphics
Superior gaming visuals with NVIDIA G-SYNC
Efficient dust-release thermal tunnel
Dedicated cooling modules for the CPU and GPU
World’s first backlit anti-ghosting keyboard with 30-key rollover
Upgradeable to 64GB DDR4 RAM
The latest NVMe SSD for blazing-fast speeds
Intel Thunderbolt 3 with USB Type-C
